elements.label: A Joyous Vibration
elements.description: A peal of laugther, a pulse of energy, a bubbling charm. [Gathering this influence around you can protect you from the ravages of Heartache]

elements.label: A Persisting Glamour
elements.description: Trailed by whispers, accentuated by a gasp for breath. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you in finding Passengers for the ship]

elements.label: Echoes Of Action
elements.description: Even a cooling engine still shivers and thrums. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you when the Kite is wounded]

elements.label: A Clarion Air
elements.description: A thoughtful hum, considered words, awed silence. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you in attracting clever crewmembers]

elements.label: An Edge Of Static
elements.description: Just beyond perception, wings beat within the skull. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you once Authorities have their eyes on you]

elements.label: A Deafening Repose
elements.description: I carry a silence that others hesitate to break. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you in having an uneventful voyage once you set sail]

elements.label: A Lingering Thrill
elements.description: If a challenge is not accepted, your domination is. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you attracting an adventurous crew]

elements.label: A Ring Of Insight
elements.description: Lies flounder, voices waver, even silence is a door to truth. [Having gathered this Influence around you will aid you collecting Packages when exploring the streets with an open heart]
